data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I have been to the Sydney Opera House. It is located in Sydney, Australia. I went there during the open day. It looked like white seashells and it was a famous landmark in Australia. I went there because Open Day was a rare event in the Opera House's history, it allowed me to get a free ticket to observe the inner structure of the architecture. And usually, the inside is not open to the public. So I went there just to see how it was designed and structured.
data.referenceText: Talk about an interesting building you visited once. Where was it? What did it look like? Why were you visiting there?
data.referenceTranslate: 说说你曾经参观过的有趣的建筑，它在哪里?它看起来像什么?你为什么会去那里?
